english.segment1: started out, we were 17. bought a van and we hit the scene. didn't know exactly what to do
english.segment2: finished school, got our band on track. signed our first record contract. never thought our dreams would all come true
english.segment4: we just wanna thank you for all that we've been through together. dreams become reality. and we just wanna thank you one more time
english.segment5: left home, ontario, heard our song on the radio. never knew that life could be this way. loved a girl and she loved me. bought a house in tennessee. i thank god for blessing me each day
english.segment7: we just wanna thank you for all that we've been through together. dreams become reality. and we just wanna thank you one more time
english.segment9: we just wanna thank you for all that we've been through together. dreams become reality. and we just wanna thank you one more time.
